channel.title: READ! Control Panel Transfer [allstar]
channel.description:
I recently got the Dragzscape source and it has a control panel on it. It is allstar source. So is my server. I was wanting to transfer the control panel to my source how we i do that? PLEASE HELP ME.
Skype: VanzShoez

item.title: READ! Control Panel Transfer [allstar]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You would need to rip it out, a good starting point would be your main class, as itâ€™s almost indefinitely created there. Then just run through your code copying code over. Or you can try using this tutorial, it might be for a different revision but the basic idea is the same. You create a frame and have it access your server, on its own thread, manipulating it as you see fit. You should look at this tutorial, it looks at using swing components.

Read full topic
